response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $800,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price considering its significance to both of us. My proposal is to sell this product to you for $950,000. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I trust that this offer will be appealing and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
